name: ircu - Universal IRC Daemon
short_description: Universal IRC Daemon -- This was formerly the ircd used on Undernet, under development by Carlo Wood (Run)1993 - 2000. Undernet forked and resumed development elsewhere. This code is still more or less in the state that it was in when Carlo stopped.
